---
page_title: "certkit_cert_request Data Source - certkit"
description: |-
  Parses a PEM-encoded Certificate Signing Request (CSR) and exposes its subject, SANs, and key details.
---

# certkit_cert_request (Data Source)

Parses a PEM-encoded Certificate Signing Request (CSR) and exposes its subject fields, Subject Alternative Names, key algorithm, and signature algorithm. The CSR signature is verified during parsing.

## Example Usage

### Inspect a CSR generated by the resource

```hcl
resource "certkit_cert_request" "renewal" {
  cert_pem = data.certkit_certificate.app.cert_pem
}

data "certkit_cert_request" "inspect" {
  cert_request_pem = certkit_cert_request.renewal.cert_request_pem
}

output "common_name" {
  value = data.certkit_cert_request.inspect.subject_common_name
}

output "dns_names" {
  value = data.certkit_cert_request.inspect.dns_names
}

output "key_algorithm" {
  value = data.certkit_cert_request.inspect.key_algorithm
}
```

### Inspect a CSR from a file

```hcl
data "certkit_cert_request" "from_file" {
  cert_request_pem = file("certs/request.csr")
}

output "subject" {
  value = data.certkit_cert_request.from_file.subject_common_name
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `cert_request_pem` (String) - PEM-encoded Certificate Signing Request to inspect.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) - Computed identifier.
- `subject_common_name` (String) - Common Name (CN) from the CSR subject.
- `subject_organization` (List of String) - Organization (O) values from the CSR subject.
- `subject_country` (List of String) - Country (C) values from the CSR subject.
- `dns_names` (List of String) - DNS Subject Alternative Names from the CSR.
- `ip_addresses` (List of String) - IP address Subject Alternative Names from the CSR.
- `uris` (List of String) - URI Subject Alternative Names from the CSR.
- `key_algorithm` (String) - Algorithm of the public key: `ECDSA`, `RSA`, or `Ed25519`.
- `signature_algorithm` (String) - Signature algorithm used to sign the CSR.
